title: Eddie Jones hits back at Warren Gatland: 'All the best for the third place playoff'
text:
Eddie Jones has hit back at Warren Gatland after the Wales coach questioned whether England would be able to replicate the intensity of their victory over New Zealand when they face South Africa in the World Cup final on Saturday.

Gatland, speaking after his team had been beaten 19-16 by South Africa in the second semi-final in the International Stadium Yokohama on Sunday, said: “We have seen in previous World Cups that teams sometimes play their final in semi-finals and don’t always turn up for a final. So will be interesting to see how England are next week and it could be a good game.”

Jones, when asked for his view on Gatland’s comments replied with a smile: “Well, guys, can you just send...
description: Eddie Jones has hit back at Warren Gatland after the Wales coach questioned whether England would be able to replicate the intensity of their victory over New Zealand when they face South Africa in the World Cup final on Saturday.
